key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges related to Medicare billing practices
Heavy reliance on Medicare, Medicaid, and private insurance reimbursements
Labor shortages in nursing and therapy roles
Ongoing impact of COVID-19 on staffing and operations
controversies: $4 million settlement for improper Medicare billing at a Nevada facility
$48 million settlement for inaccurate Medicare information and admitting ineligible patients
Criticism for admitting patients 'too sick or disabled' to benefit from intensive therapy
social_issues: Staffing shortages and supply chain disruptions affecting care quality
Ethical concerns about patient care standards
governance_issues: Legal settlements and compliance risks impacting investor confidence
